name: Scratch Island (Online World)
description:
This is an online world where players can make friends, chat, and customize their character. Right now the game still needs a lot of work to add things like mini-games and more locations to explore, but it's currently in a fully functional state.

Controls
  • Arrows or WASD - Moving
Item codes ItemImageCodeParty hat
/100Orange shirt/orangeshirtBlue shirt/blueshirtGreen shirt/greenshirtJetpack/jetpackBlack sunglasses/darkmodeRed tinted  sunglasses/glassRed shoes/fireshoesTan pants/pantsBlue pants/bluepantsBlue shoes/blueshoesBrown shoes/mudGlow stick/glow

Copy and paste codes into the chat to unlock items.
